LF010.LF010_Area500_Talk_Intro_00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf11"/][UE:Meta key="52d78ba6b2ca419f9da7a6fc9a805568" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]I'm [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Leaf11"/]Komo[Npc:EmphasisEnd/],[etc:Wait frame="8"/] an ecohydrologist.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="52d78ba6b2ca419f9da7a6fc9a805568" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02FaceOnly"/]The environment on my planet is well below
standard.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] The water quality and natural
purification systems are devastated.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="52d78ba6b2ca419f9da7a6fc9a805568" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]I'm here to investigate the water on this
planet and use my findings to improve
the state of water back at home.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="52d78ba6b2ca419f9da7a6fc9a805568" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="SadFaceOnly"/]Getting leafified was, uh,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] scary.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I can't
thank you enough for saving me.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="52d78ba6b2ca419f9da7a6fc9a805568" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]You've saved a lot of lives.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I guess that
means you're pretty skilled.
LF010.LF010_Area500_Talk_Hint_01_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf11"/][UE:Meta key="559cb18f4e1f4c22af606258f4e46afb" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Sad"/]You can tell the water on my planet is
unhealthy by its color alone.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Plus it stinks![etc:Wait frame="15"/]
It's not potable and needs to be purified.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="559cb18f4e1f4c22af606258f4e46afb" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02FaceOnly"/]This planet's water is bright and clear,[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
suitable for drinking.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Hopefully I'll find a
way to replicate its purification process.
LF010.LF010_Area500_Talk_Hint_01_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf11"/][UE:Meta key="46362af790e643a9940924046aed0282" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="SadTalk"/]Talking isn't my strong suit.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I've devoted
my entire life to water.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] So,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] that probably
explains why.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="46362af790e643a9940924046aed0282" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="ThinkFaceOnly"/]But I should try to improve my own
processes as well.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Talking to you
helps,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I think.
LF010.LF010_Area500_Talk_Hint_01_03:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf11"/][UE:Meta key="939fcdc9be6749e7b20ee4f2ffd42bef" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/][Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal21"/]Twyla[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] from our task force is quite
knowledgeable about geology.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] She's even
given me a private lecture on the subject.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="939fcdc9be6749e7b20ee4f2ffd42bef" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="GladFaceOnly2"/]She says there are certain soil types here
that act as water-purification systems.[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
Bringing some home could save my planet.
LF010.LF010_Area500_Talk_Hint_01_04:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf11"/][UE:Meta key="74193d3d09fc419396a4421da97eb8e4" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Most of the water on this planet is
nonpotable due to the amount of salt
it contains.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="74193d3d09fc419396a4421da97eb8e4" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02FaceOnly"/]However,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] a lot of the water I've found
flowing through the land has a much lower
salt concentration.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] And it tastes delicious![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="74193d3d09fc419396a4421da97eb8e4" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Question"/]It's strange to have two such different
water types in close proximity.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I'll have
to investigate further.
LF010.LF010_Area500_Talk_Hint_01_05:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf11"/][UE:Meta key="0ad88d1b2b5943e58f1ffc4efca009b0" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]I appreciate all the topics you've provided
for us to discuss.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I've found that talking
is unexpectedly...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]fun.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="0ad88d1b2b5943e58f1ffc4efca009b0" Scale="1"/]Please continue to provide more topics.[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
And I'll do the same.
LF010.LF010_Area500_Talk_Hint_01_06:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf11"/][UE:Meta key="69188afc398a47b4ad8c72b369fba19e" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="GladTalk"/]This planet has an abundance of
minerals.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Leaf10"/]Kit[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] is a mineralogist,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] so he
must be enjoying himself.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="69188afc398a47b4ad8c72b369fba19e" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02FaceOnly"/]I recently found a rock that tastes like
salt.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I'll have to show it to him sometime.
LF010.LF010_Area500_Talk_Hint_02_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf11"/][UE:Meta key="5f655dd71bf443a681e97f29491856fd" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]I'm not too good at making conversation.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="5f655dd71bf443a681e97f29491856fd" Scale="1"/]But I think I'm starting to get used to it,[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
thanks to our chats.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="5f655dd71bf443a681e97f29491856fd" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]I hope you'll keep making time to converse
with me.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I should make efforts to speak
with more of the others.
LF010.LF010_Area500_Talk_Hint_02_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf11"/][UE:Meta key="29779c661b6b47f08b56dd239138f9aa" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]The water on this planet has high salinity.[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
If you were to drink it,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] the salt levels in
your body could become dangerously high.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="29779c661b6b47f08b56dd239138f9aa" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]But I did locate some water where the salt
levels are relatively low, and you can drink
the water as is.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Amazing...
LF010.LF010_Area500_Talk_Hint_02_03:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf11"/][UE:Meta key="4c82e49186164a0dabfb9965f926f027" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/][Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal21"/]Twyla[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] is often off by herself.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I'm the same
way and usually find myself alone.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="4c82e49186164a0dabfb9965f926f027" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="GladFaceOnly2"/]She's really easy to talk to when we both
break out of our shells a bit.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I'd probably
count her as one of my closest friends.
LF010.LF010_Area500_Talk_Hint_02_04:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf11"/][UE:Meta key="75552cfb75fd41ef9610309fff2ba7f7" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]There's a way to safely drink water with
high sodium contentâ€”but only after
heating it and separating it from the salt.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="75552cfb75fd41ef9610309fff2ba7f7" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02FaceOnly"/]The potable-water supply on this planet is
very limited.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] You have to be creative.
LF010.LF010_Area500_Talk_Hint_02_05:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf11"/][UE:Meta key="f2d4ef796b4740c698b473204fffa653" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]The leader of this task force is very
interesting.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I find him to be easygoing
and pleasant to engage in conversation.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="f2d4ef796b4740c698b473204fffa653" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="GladFaceOnly"/]I guess that's because I don't get too
nervous around him.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] You should chat
with him too sometime.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] You'd like him.
LF010.LF010_Area500_Talk_Hint_02_06:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf11"/][UE:Meta key="4362ac7b934842aeb50035627039e58a" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]Soil quality is a key component in the
water-purification process.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Each layer
of dirt and rock is integral.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="4362ac7b934842aeb50035627039e58a" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]It might just be the secret to making
dirty water drinkable.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I'll be implementing
these methods once I return home.
LF010.LF010_Area500_Talk_Hint_02_07:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf11"/][UE:Meta key="0acfea1482ae4ea8be733e55ab0c19d0" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/][Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal21"/]Twyla[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] from our task force is quite
knowledgeable about geology.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] She's even
given me a private lecture on the subject.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="0acfea1482ae4ea8be733e55ab0c19d0" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="GladFaceOnly2"/]She says there are certain soil types here
that act as water-purification systems.[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
Bringing some home could save my planet.
LF010.LF010_Area500_Talk_Hint_02_08:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf11"/][UE:Meta key="ce6cb6b8416b4d84a7bbb8d12a3ef560" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="GladTalk"/]This planet has an abundance of
minerals.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Leaf10"/]Kit[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] is a mineralogist,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] so he
must be enjoying himself.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="ce6cb6b8416b4d84a7bbb8d12a3ef560" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02FaceOnly"/]I recently found a rock that tastes like
salt.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I'll have to show it to him sometime.
LF010.LF010_Area500_Talk_HappyTalk_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf11"/][UE:Meta key="4631f3124b1f4d0f9c6a357574e4f07b" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="GladTalk"/]I'm interested in studying the chemical
makeup of your drool.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Could I bother you
for a sample?
LF010.LF010_Area500_Talk_HappyTalk_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf11"/][UE:Meta key="3d76debdd6ef41ce82f0e5f4e3164cd1" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]I can talk with you without getting nervous
at all.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Sometimes we can even make eye
contact![etc:Wait frame="15"/] That's big for me.
LF010.LF010_Area500_Talk_Outro_T01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf11"/][UE:Meta key="146a677124054e9a9940332913b16152" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Question"/]We have the same face.[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I'm curious.[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
Where did you come from?[etc:Wait frame="15"/] The strange
possibilities of this universe are endless...
